name: overthinking.
description:
overthinking is a game about dealing with anxious thoughts. 

often, people claim to 'hate' something as a mask, but in reality, they hate how something makes them feel.

sometimes we say we hate something, to shield ourselves from any anxious feelings that could occur as a result.

like saying you hate surprises.

note: i was not allowed to code for this game, as such the only way to close it is to alt +f4

there are also two endings of the game depending on which part of the map you fall off of. pay attention for the game will tell you.

-star
